list.name: Default
list.comment: Updated the monster cs class to drop items at the position of the transforms.position + the last hit direction on the monster. Should offset it a bit. May need to multiple the lastDirection by a scaler. Needs testing.

task.summary: Updated the infinite mana changes. Currently it is set to L and a 2 minute timer, havent done the UI for it. I will set that as one fo ym goals enxt week.
